attributes.action: honour his pledge made in July 06 to robustly protect the land designated as green belt.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is against the proposed house building targets (involving increase in footprint and infilling) for East Dorset which will result in a substatial erosion of the existing Green Belt to allow high density housing to extend from Bournmouth and Poole uninterrupted into Parley, Ferndown and Wimbourne. This follows extensive development, infilling, replacement of houses with flats that have progressed relentlessly and with increasing momentum over the past few decades.
